content: अनुकूल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अनुगतः कूलं तटं स्नेहादिबंधनं वा] {@--1@} Favourable, agreeable (<ab>lit.</ab> following the bank or slope, according to the current, with the grain;), as wind, fate &c.; मंदं मंदं नुदति पवनश्चानुकूलो यथा त्वां <ls>Me. 9</ls>; शांत°पवनश्च <ls>Ś. 4. 10</ls>; °परिणामा संवृत्ता <ls>Ś. 7</ls>; <ls>V. 3. 20.</ls> {@--2@} Friendly, kind, well or kindly disposed. {@--3@} Conformable to; pleasing, agreeable or favourable to, conducing to, capable of; <ab>oft.</ab> in <ab>comp.</ab>; स्पर्शानुकूला इव सूर्यकांताः <ls>Ś. 2. 7</ls>; अननुकूलोऽभिमानस्य <ls>K. 45</ls> not inclined to pride; दर्शनानुकूलाहमस्य न वेति <ls n="K.">197</ls>; कुशलविरचितानुकूलवेशः <ls>R. 5. 76</ls> befitting, suitable. --लः {@--1@} A faithful or kind husband, (एकरतिः <ls>S. D.</ls> or एकनिरतः एकस्यामेव नायिकायां आसक्तः), a variety of नायक. {@--2@} ‘Favourable to all,’ epithet of Viṣṇu. --ला {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of a tree (दंती) Croton Polyandrum. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a metre. --लं {@--1@} Favour, kindness; नारीणामनुकूलमाचरति चेत् <ls>K.
